en.title: HRH Sultanah of Pahang Hajjah Kalsom Visits FusionExcel's Booth at Health & Happiness Festival 2009!
en.content:
REPORT FROM FUSIONEXCEL EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR JASEN KHOO.

FusionExcel is proud to be one of the main sponsors of the inaugural Health and Happiness Festival 2009, held on 21st and 22nd March 2009 at the Grand Millennium Hotel, Kuala Lumpur. 

To quote the Organizer, Myriam Oliveres "The Festival is the first of its kind in the country to have both allopathic medicine and alternative healing under one roof, offering Malaysians a balanced approach to health and well being. It presented a unique concept of exhibitors (promoting healthy products and equipment, doctors, therapists, healers, etc), live stage demonstrations, music and workshops/seminars. It provided the platform for the public and the professionals to come together to share, learn, give and receive natural health and happiness".

FusionExcel is very honored that Duli Yang Maha Mulia Sultanah of Pahang Sultanah Hajjah Kalsom, the Patron of the Festival and of the Wealth of Women Centre, paid a visit to FusionExcel's booth and learn more about FusionExcel's range of scalar energy products.

FusionExcel's booth attracted a good number of visitors, both local and foreign, raising the level of awareness of the visitors of the benefits of FusionExcel's products. FusionExcel representatives gave demonstrations to the visitors, to their amazement.

FusionExcel Presidential Director, Fay Lim made a presentation entitled “Feeling is Believing!” while FusionExcel spokesperson, Ms. Law King Kiew gave a very touching testimony of her experience with the Quantum Pendant during the workshop session. Presidential Director Alex Long, Executive Director Jasen Khoo and Director Kevin Lim also represented FusionExcel at the Festival.

Profits from the Festival will be channeled to the Wealth of Women Centre for underprivileged and abused women. FusionExcel wishes the Wealth of Women Centre every success in its endeavors, in “Moving Women from Misery to Victory”.
